00056 /* Clamps/Limits the given coordinate to:  limits[0] <= co[axis] <= limits[1]
00057  * The amount of clamp is saved on dcut */
00058 static void axis_limit(int axis, const float limits[2], float co[3], float dcut[3])
00059 {
00060     float val = co[axis];
00061     if (limits[0] > val) val = limits[0];
00062     if (limits[1] < val) val = limits[1];
00063 
00064     dcut[axis] = co[axis] - val;
00065     co[axis] = val;
00066 }
00067 
00068 static void simpleDeform_taper(const float factor, const float dcut[3], float *co)
00069 {
00070     float x = co[0], y = co[1], z = co[2];
00071     float scale = z*factor;
00072 
00073     co[0] = x + x*scale;
00074     co[1] = y + y*scale;
00075     co[2] = z;
00076 
00077     if (dcut) {
00078         co[0] += dcut[0];
00079         co[1] += dcut[1];
00080         co[2] += dcut[2];
00081     }
00082 }
00083 
00084 static void simpleDeform_stretch(const float factor, const float dcut[3], float *co)
00085 {
00086     float x = co[0], y = co[1], z = co[2];
00087     float scale;
00088 
00089     scale = (z*z*factor-factor + 1.0f);
00090 
00091     co[0] = x*scale;
00092     co[1] = y*scale;
00093     co[2] = z*(1.0f+factor);
00094 
00095     if (dcut) {
00096         co[0] += dcut[0];
00097         co[1] += dcut[1];
00098         co[2] += dcut[2];
00099     }
00100 }
00101 
00102 static void simpleDeform_twist(const float factor, const float *dcut, float *co)
00103 {
00104     float x = co[0], y = co[1], z = co[2];
00105     float theta, sint, cost;
00106 
00107     theta = z*factor;
00108     sint  = sin(theta);
00109     cost  = cos(theta);
00110 
00111     co[0] = x*cost - y*sint;
00112     co[1] = x*sint + y*cost;
00113     co[2] = z;
00114 
00115     if (dcut) {
00116         co[0] += dcut[0];
00117         co[1] += dcut[1];
00118         co[2] += dcut[2];
00119     }
00120 }
00121 
00122 static void simpleDeform_bend(const float factor, const float dcut[3], float *co)
00123 {
00124     float x = co[0], y = co[1], z = co[2];
00125     float theta, sint, cost;
00126 
00127     theta = x*factor;
00128     sint = sin(theta);
00129     cost = cos(theta);
00130 
00131     if (fabsf(factor) > 1e-7f) {
00132         co[0] = -(y-1.0f/factor)*sint;
00133         co[1] =  (y-1.0f/factor)*cost + 1.0f/factor;
00134         co[2] = z;
00135     }
00136 
00137     if (dcut) {
00138         co[0] += cost*dcut[0];
00139         co[1] += sint*dcut[0];
00140         co[2] += dcut[2];
00141     }
00142 
00143 }

00146 /* simple deform modifier */
00147 static void SimpleDeformModifier_do(SimpleDeformModifierData *smd, struct Object *ob, struct DerivedMesh *dm, float (*vertexCos)[3], int numVerts)
00148 {
00149     static const float lock_axis[2] = {0.0f, 0.0f};
00150 
00151     int i;
00152     int limit_axis = 0;
00153     float smd_limit[2], smd_factor;
00154     SpaceTransform *transf = NULL, tmp_transf;
00155     void (*simpleDeform_callback)(const float factor, const float dcut[3], float *co) = NULL;   //Mode callback
00156     int vgroup;
00157     MDeformVert *dvert;
00158 
00159     //Safe-check
00160     if (smd->origin == ob) smd->origin = NULL;                  //No self references
00161 
00162     if (smd->limit[0] < 0.0f) smd->limit[0] = 0.0f;
00163     if (smd->limit[0] > 1.0f) smd->limit[0] = 1.0f;
00164 
00165     smd->limit[0] = MIN2(smd->limit[0], smd->limit[1]);         //Upper limit >= than lower limit
00166 
00167     //Calculate matrixs do convert between coordinate spaces
00168     if (smd->origin) {
00169         transf = &tmp_transf;
00170 
00171         if (smd->originOpts & MOD_SIMPLEDEFORM_ORIGIN_LOCAL) {
00172             space_transform_from_matrixs(transf, ob->obmat, smd->origin->obmat);
00173         }
00174         else {
00175             copy_m4_m4(transf->local2target, smd->origin->obmat);
00176             invert_m4_m4(transf->target2local, transf->local2target);
00177         }
00178     }
00179 
00180     //Setup vars
00181     limit_axis  = (smd->mode == MOD_SIMPLEDEFORM_MODE_BEND) ? 0 : 2; //Bend limits on X.. all other modes limit on Z
00182 
00183     //Update limits if needed
00184     {
00185         float lower =  FLT_MAX;
00186         float upper = -FLT_MAX;
00187 
00188         for (i=0; i<numVerts; i++)
00189         {
00190             float tmp[3];
00191             copy_v3_v3(tmp, vertexCos[i]);
00192 
00193             if (transf) space_transform_apply(transf, tmp);
00194 
00195             lower = MIN2(lower, tmp[limit_axis]);
00196             upper = MAX2(upper, tmp[limit_axis]);
00197         }
00198 
00199 
00200         //SMD values are normalized to the BV, calculate the absolut values
00201         smd_limit[1] = lower + (upper-lower)*smd->limit[1];
00202         smd_limit[0] = lower + (upper-lower)*smd->limit[0];
00203 
00204         smd_factor   = smd->factor / MAX2(FLT_EPSILON, smd_limit[1]-smd_limit[0]);
00205     }
00206 
00207     modifier_get_vgroup(ob, dm, smd->vgroup_name, &dvert, &vgroup);
00208 
00209     switch(smd->mode)
00210     {
00211         case MOD_SIMPLEDEFORM_MODE_TWIST:   simpleDeform_callback = simpleDeform_twist;     break;
00212         case MOD_SIMPLEDEFORM_MODE_BEND:    simpleDeform_callback = simpleDeform_bend;      break;
00213         case MOD_SIMPLEDEFORM_MODE_TAPER:   simpleDeform_callback = simpleDeform_taper;     break;
00214         case MOD_SIMPLEDEFORM_MODE_STRETCH: simpleDeform_callback = simpleDeform_stretch;   break;
00215         default:
00216             return; //No simpledeform mode?
00217     }
00218 
00219     for (i=0; i<numVerts; i++)
00220     {
00221         float weight = defvert_array_find_weight_safe(dvert, i, vgroup);
00222 
00223         if (weight != 0.0f) {
00224             float co[3], dcut[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
00225 
00226             if (transf) {
00227                 space_transform_apply(transf, vertexCos[i]);
00228             }
00229 
00230             copy_v3_v3(co, vertexCos[i]);
00231 
00232             /* Apply axis limits */
00233             if (smd->mode != MOD_SIMPLEDEFORM_MODE_BEND) { /* Bend mode shoulnt have any lock axis */
00234                 if (smd->axis & MOD_SIMPLEDEFORM_LOCK_AXIS_X) axis_limit(0, lock_axis, co, dcut);
00235                 if (smd->axis & MOD_SIMPLEDEFORM_LOCK_AXIS_Y) axis_limit(1, lock_axis, co, dcut);
00236             }
00237             axis_limit(limit_axis, smd_limit, co, dcut);
00238 
00239             simpleDeform_callback(smd_factor, dcut, co);        //Apply deform
00240             interp_v3_v3v3(vertexCos[i], vertexCos[i], co, weight); //Use vertex weight has coef of linear interpolation
00241 
00242             if (transf) space_transform_invert(transf, vertexCos[i]);
00243         }
00244     }
00245 }

00250 /* SimpleDeform */
00251 static void initData(ModifierData *md)
00252 {
00253     SimpleDeformModifierData *smd = (SimpleDeformModifierData*) md;
00254 
00255     smd->mode = MOD_SIMPLEDEFORM_MODE_TWIST;
00256     smd->axis = 0;
00257 
00258     smd->origin   =  NULL;
00259     smd->factor   =  0.35f;
00260     smd->limit[0] =  0.0f;
00261     smd->limit[1] =  1.0f;
00262 }
00263 
00264 static void copyData(ModifierData *md, ModifierData *target)
00265 {
00266     SimpleDeformModifierData *smd  = (SimpleDeformModifierData*)md;
00267     SimpleDeformModifierData *tsmd = (SimpleDeformModifierData*)target;
00268 
00269     tsmd->mode  = smd->mode;
00270     tsmd->axis  = smd->axis;
00271     tsmd->origin= smd->origin;
00272     tsmd->originOpts= smd->originOpts;
00273     tsmd->factor= smd->factor;
00274     memcpy(tsmd->limit, smd->limit, sizeof(tsmd->limit));
00275     BLI_strncpy(tsmd->vgroup_name, smd->vgroup_name, sizeof(tsmd->vgroup_name));
00276 }
00277 
00278 static CustomDataMask requiredDataMask(Object *UNUSED(ob), ModifierData *md)
00279 {
00280     SimpleDeformModifierData *smd = (SimpleDeformModifierData *)md;
00281     CustomDataMask dataMask = 0;
00282 
00283     /* ask for vertexgroups if we need them */
00284     if (smd->vgroup_name[0])
00285         dataMask |= CD_MASK_MDEFORMVERT;
00286 
00287     return dataMask;
00288 }

00290 static void foreachObjectLink(ModifierData *md, Object *ob, void (*walk)(void *userData, Object *ob, Object **obpoin), void *userData)
00291 {
00292     SimpleDeformModifierData *smd  = (SimpleDeformModifierData*)md;
00293     walk(userData, ob, &smd->origin);
00294 }
00295 
00296 static void updateDepgraph(ModifierData *md, DagForest *forest,
00297                         struct Scene *UNUSED(scene),
00298                         Object *UNUSED(ob),
00299                         DagNode *obNode)
00300 {
00301     SimpleDeformModifierData *smd  = (SimpleDeformModifierData*)md;
00302 
00303     if (smd->origin)
00304         dag_add_relation(forest, dag_get_node(forest, smd->origin), obNode, DAG_RL_OB_DATA, "SimpleDeform Modifier");
00305 }
00306 
00307 static void deformVerts(ModifierData *md, Object *ob,
00308                         DerivedMesh *derivedData,
00309                         float (*vertexCos)[3],
00310                         int numVerts,
00311                         int UNUSED(useRenderParams),
00312                         int UNUSED(isFinalCalc))
00313 {
00314     DerivedMesh *dm = derivedData;
00315     CustomDataMask dataMask = requiredDataMask(ob, md);
00316 
00317     /* we implement requiredDataMask but thats not really useful since
00318      * mesh_calc_modifiers pass a NULL derivedData */
00319     if (dataMask)
00320         dm= get_dm(ob, NULL, dm, NULL, 0);
00321 
00322     SimpleDeformModifier_do((SimpleDeformModifierData*)md, ob, dm, vertexCos, numVerts);
00323 
00324     if (dm != derivedData)
00325         dm->release(dm);
00326 }
00327 
00328 static void deformVertsEM(ModifierData *md, Object *ob,
00329                         struct BMEditMesh *editData,
00330                         DerivedMesh *derivedData,
00331                         float (*vertexCos)[3],
00332                         int numVerts)
00333 {
00334     DerivedMesh *dm = derivedData;
00335     CustomDataMask dataMask = requiredDataMask(ob, md);
00336 
00337     /* we implement requiredDataMask but thats not really useful since
00338      * mesh_calc_modifiers pass a NULL derivedData */
00339     if (dataMask)
00340         dm= get_dm(ob, editData, dm, NULL, 0);
00341 
00342     SimpleDeformModifier_do((SimpleDeformModifierData*)md, ob, dm, vertexCos, numVerts);
00343 
00344     if (dm != derivedData)
00345         dm->release(dm);
00346 }
